#include <Locale.h>

Detailed Description

This header file defines locale. 

  Locale* lcl = new Locale("en", "US", "william");
  Locale* lcl1 = new Locale("zh", "CN", "chenyu");
  if (lcl)
  {
      printf("%s","instance create succ.\n");
      printf("toString is %s.\n",(&(lcl->toString()))->string());
      printf("getCountry is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getCountry()))->string());
      printf("getDisplayCountry is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayCountry()))->string());
      printf("getLanguage is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getLanguage()))->string());
      printf("getDisplayLanguage is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayLanguage()))->string());
      printf("getVariant is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getVariant()))->string());
      printf("getDisplayVariant is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayVariant()))->string());
      printf("getDisplayName is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayName()))->string());
      printf("getISO3Country is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getISO3Country()))->string());
      printf("getISO3Language is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getISO3Language()))->string());
      Locale::setDefault(lcl);

      printf("getDisplayCountry is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayCountry(lcl)))->string());
      printf("getDisplayLanguage is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayLanguage(lcl)))->string());
      printf("getDisplayVariant is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayVariant(lcl)))->string());
      printf("getDisplayName is %s.\n",(&(lcl->getDisplayName(lcl)))->string());

      {
        gaia::base::Vector< gaia::base::String >  vGet = lcl->getISOLanguages();
        size_t size = vGet.size();
        for (size_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
          printf("getISOLanguages is %s.\n",vGet[i].string());
      }
      }
      {
        gaia::base::Vector< gaia::base::String >  vGet = lcl->getISOCountries();
        size_t size = vGet.size();
        for (size_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
          printf("getISOCountries is %s.\n",vGet[i].string());
      }
      }
      delete lcl;
      lcl = NULL;
  }
  else
  {
      printf("%s","instance create field.\n");
  }
